death.attack.shockwave.player: %1$s got crushed by a shockwave caused by %2$s
death.attack.shockwave.item: %1$s got crushed by a shockwave caused by %2$s
death.attack.shotgun: %1$s was pumped full of lead by %2$s
death.attack.shotgun.item: %1$s was pumped full of lead by %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.swordsmachine.item: %1$s was cut in half by %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.parry_projectile: %1$s got killed by %2$s parrying their projectile back at them
death.attack.parry_projectile.item: %1$s got killed by %2$s parrying their projectile back at them
death.attack.proj_boost: %1$s got blown to bits with a projectile boost by %2$s
death.attack.proj_boost.item: %1$s got blown to bits with a projectile boost by %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.ricochet: %1$s fell victim to a ricochet started by %2$s
death.attack.ricochet.item: %1$s fell victim to a ricochet started by %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.overcharge: %1$s felt the full force of %2$s's enthusiasm to be destructive
death.attack.overcharge.item: %1$s felt the full force of %2$ss enthusiasm handling %3$s
death.attack.overcharge-self: %s got overzealous handling a Pump Shotgun
death.attack.overcharge-self.player: %1$s got overzealous handling a Pump Shotgun whilst fighting %2$s
command.ultracraft.block.client-success: [Ultracraft] Block Successful! The User will now only be displayed with default wings.
command.ultracraft.time-freeze.fail: [Ultracraft] Can't freeze time while the Time Freezing Gamerule is disabled.
gamerule.ultra-projBoost.description: Restricts what Projectiles can be boosted (aka self-parried immediately when shot, for example hitting your own arrow, making it do a lot more damage).
gamerule.ultra-hiVelMode.description: Sets whether players are free to switch between modes or force it to always be on/off for everyone. (aka HiVel-Mode)
gamerule.ultra-disableHandSwap.descripti: Prevents Players from switching their offhand using a keybind.
gamerule.ultra-hivelJumpBoost.descriptio: How high Players can jump in High Velocity Mode.
gamerule.ultra-allowSlamStorage.descript: Whether using the titular advanced movement technique is possible.
gamerule.ultra-hivelFallDamage.descripti: Whether Players can take Fall Damage in High Velocity Mode.
gamerule.ultra-hivelDrowning.description: Whether Players can drown in High Velocity Mode.
gamerule.ultra-bloodHealing.description: Whether a Player is healed from a nearby mob taking damage.
gamerule.ultra-speed.description: How fast Players are in High Velocity Mode.
gamerule.ultra-gravityReduction.descript: How much gravity should be reduced in High Velocity Mode. (0 = normal - 10 = almost no gravity)
gamerule.ultra-effectivelyViolent.descri: Enables Features Locked to Hard on any difficulty. (for example, enraging malicious face)
gamerule.ultra-explosionBlockBreaking.de: Whether Ultracraft Explosions can destroy Blocks
gamerule.ultra-swordsmachineSafeLedges.d: Stops Swordsmachine from falling down ledges
gamerule.ultra-parryChaining.description: Allows Projectiles to be parried multiple times, increasing Damage, Explosion Radius and Speed on each Parry.
gamerule.ultra-tntPriming.description: Whether Ultracraft Explosions can set off TNT.
message.ultracraft.hi-vel-forced: This World is forcing §bHigh Velocity Mode§r to be %s
message.ultracraft.hi-vel-free: This World allows toggling §bHigh Velocity Mode§r freely
message.ultracraft.freeze-forced: This World is forcing the §bTime-Freeze effect§r to be %s
message.ultracraft.fall-damage: §cHigh Velocity Mode will NOT spare you from fall damage here!
message.ultracraft.fall-drowning: §cHigh Velocity Mode will NOT keep you from drowning here!
message.ultracraft.projectile-boost.ALLO: You can Projectile Boost ANY Projectile!
message.ultracraft.projectile-boost.LIMI: You can Projectile Boost only Shotgun Shots.
message.ultracraft.projectile-boost.ENTI: You can Projectile Boost only specific Server Defined Projectiles.
message.ultracraft.blood-heal.ONLY_HIVEL: §4Blood§r is Fuel. (when in High Velocity Mode)
message.ultracraft.join-info: §7You can disable this message in the mod config.
message.ultracraft.server.freeze-enable-: [§4Ultracraft§r] h-hey, you just enabled the freeze effect! Please be aware that this effect is §4SERVER-WIDE§r, so any time-freeze affects EVERYONE. If you have many players, please consider leaving this turned off.
message.ultracraft.server.projboost-all: [§4Ultracraft§r] All Projectiles can now be Projectile boosted. This includes Arrows, Tridents, enderpearls and even Rockets
message.ultracraft.server.projboost-limi: [§4Ultracraft§r] Only Shotgun Primary Fire can now be Projectile Boosted.
message.ultracraft.server.projboost-tag: [§4Ultracraft§r] Only Projectiles in the "projboostable" entity tag can now be Projectile boosted. (customize via datapack)
message.ultracraft.server.projboost-disa: [§4Ultracraft§r] Projectile Boosts have been entirely disabled.
message.ultracraft.fish.disable: You can disable this joke in the mod config
message.ultracraft.fish.mania3: IT HAS TO BE OUT THERE... SOMEWHERE
message.ultracraft.fish.mania5:
...that's... 
that's bigger than usual! 
I have to be getting close!!
message.ultracraft.handswap-disabled: [§4Ultracraft§r] This Server has disabled hand quick-swapping.
message.ultracraft.content:
Welcome to Ultracraft!
This Mod aims to recreate the game Ultrakill (by §6Arsi "Hakita" Patala§f) and its mechanics in Minecraft. The Current Content includes:
- All Prologue Enemies
- 6 Weapons
- A few Blocks and Items
- A few Secrets/Jokes

The next noteworthy Update will be §6Chapter I Content§f.
Please be sure to report Issues/Bugs and send any Feedback you have my way!
Relevant Links are in the Mod Info.

☆ Absolutelyaya ☆
message.ultracraft.intro-error:
Something went wrong with the Ultracraft intro sequence.
The issue: Sometimes detecting the asset reload being finished doesn't work.
Luckily, we have a button that can solve any problem!
message.ultracraft.fixer-button.tooltip:
This button actually just starts the intro Sequence manually.
Don't tell it that though, it already has self-esteem issues.
intro.ultracraft.calibration:
BOOT UP SEQUENCE READY

FIRMWARE
  §aVERSION %s§r

CALIBRATION
  §4EXPIRED§r
  §4NEW CALIBRATION REQUIRED§r
intro.ultracraft.status:
STATUS UPDATE

MACHINE ID:                %s
LOCATION:                  MINECRAFT
CURRENT OBJECTIVE:     FIND A WEAPON
§4MANKIND IS DEAD.§r
§4BLOOD IS FUEL.§r
§4HELL IS FULL.§r
screen.ultracraft.wing-settings.title: High Velocity Wings
screen.ultracraft.wing-settings.undo-des: reverts wing colors to how they were when opening the menu
screen.ultracraft.wing-settings.patterns: Disabled due to "Disable Flashy VFX" Setting.

Wing Patterns are reserved for Supporters.
Thank you for understanding!

Refresh Supporter Status
(NOTE: new Supporters are added to the list manually! It might take a bit until you receive your benefits.)
screen.ultracraft.info.supporter.title: §6§n☆ Become a Supporter ☆
screen.ultracraft.info.supporter.text:
Wanna support my work and get something out of it too?
By becoming a Supporter, you get following benefits:
+ Earlier Teasers of upcoming Features
+ Access to Test Versions
+ Access to Wing Patterns
screen.ultracraft.info.epilepsy.title: §4§n! Epilepsy Warning !
screen.ultracraft.info.epilepsy.text:
This mod contains fast movement and some flashing VFX.
The Potentially harmful VFX, like Wing Patterns,
can be disabled.
If this affects you negatively regardless,
please excercise caution and
stop playing if you feel discomfort.

Selecting "I am affected",
will automatically disable mentioned VFX.
screen.ultracraft.info.epilepsy.affected: Automatically disables said VFX. Please be mindful of your Health regardless.
screen.ultracraft.pedestal.title: Pedestal
screen.ultracraft.pedestal.lock: Locking the Pedestal will prevent right click from opening this menu.
wing-preset.ultracraft.idk: AND AGAINST ALL ODDS; THE ALL-SEEING ORANGE RISES ONCE MORE

pattern.ultracraft.flame.flavor: Danteh... Danteh we gotta get the golden boughs Danteh
pattern.ultracraft.galaxy.flavor: Because who doesn't like space radiation?
advancements.ultracraft.root.title: ULTRACRAFT
advancements.ultracraft.root.description: Here are some Challenges for you
advancements.ultracraft.coinpunch-easy.d: Punch one Coin 5 Times in a row.
advancements.ultracraft.coinpunch-medium: Punch one Coin 25 Times in a row.
advancements.ultracraft.coinpunch-hard.d: Punch one Coin 50 Times in a row.
advancements.ultracraft.chargeback-malic: Kill a Malicious Face with its own Beam Attack.
advancements.ultracraft.ricochet.title: Ricoshot
advancements.ultracraft.ricochet.descrip: Hit an Entity with a Ricochet spanning over 4 or more Coins.
advancements.ultracraft.traitor.title: Top 10 Anime Betrayals
advancements.ultracraft.traitor.descript: Kill Tundra or Agony with the Sword of their Counterpart.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.ultracraf:
Ultrakill moment

Made after a Game by §6Arsi "Hakita" Patala§r
Go play the real thing, it's much better than this mod lol
text.autoconfig.ultracraft.option.fancyG: Disable for better performance, enable for better goop!
text.autoconfig.ultracraft.option.wrapTo: Whether Goop should wrap to block edges
text.autoconfig.ultracraft.option.server: Tells you mod-relevant Game Rules upon joining a game.
text.autoconfig.ultracraft.option.detail: Tells you *more* mod-relevant Game Rules upon joining a game.
text.autoconfig.ultracraft.option.freeze: Whether Time should freeze momentarily from certain actions (parrying/projectile-boosting)
This Setting is overridden by Servers!
text.autoconfig.ultracraft.option.fishin: Adds a popup to your hud like in 5-S when fishing.
text.autoconfig.ultracraft.option.coinPu: Adds a popup to your hud that tells you how often you punched a Coin.
text.autoconfig.ultracraft.option.ultraH: Whether the UltraHUD should be rendered.
LIMITED = only show when in Hi-Velocity Mode
Adds Health and Energy bars around your Crosshair.
text.autoconfig.ultracraft.option.moveUl: Moves the UltraHUD up when holding an item that would cover it.
text.autoconfig.ultracraft.option.switch: Moves the UltraHUD to the other side of the screen.
text.autoconfig.ultracraft.option.maxTra: Caps the amount of Trails at this amount.
text.autoconfig.ultracraft.option.trailL: Renders Trails as simple lines to get a better feel for where vertices are.
text.autoconfig.ultracraft.option.slideC: How much the third person camera is moved while sliding.
text.autoconfig.ultracraft.option.slideT: How much the camera should tilt when steering a slide sideways.
text.autoconfig.ultracraft.option.trailP: Renders Trails using particles instead of the Trail renderer.
Disabling this will currently lead to Transparency Layering issues!
text.autoconfig.ultracraft.option.bloodO: If you get splashed with a LOT of blood, it might cover your screen a bit.
text.autoconfig.ultracraft.option.dangan: Replaces Blood VFX colors with neon Pink.
text.autoconfig.ultracraft.option.showPu: Spawns particles in the corners of the punch area.
text.autoconfig.ultracraft.option.moveme: Whether Sliding and quick movement should play their sound loops.
text.autoconfig.ultracraft.option.safeVF: Disable VFX that might affect photosensitive people negatively. (like flashing)
text.autoconfig.ultracraft.option.neverI: Don't show Intro after switching Versions
text.autoconfig.ultracraft.option.goopDe: [WARNING] VERY LAGGY | Adds extra particles to show vertex info of goop puddles
text.autoconfig.ultracraft.option.hideWi: Lets you hide High Velocity Wings
